title: ‘Serial pedophile began raping little girl when she was in her car seat’
text:
Tony Kiah Carver reportedly raped a little girl over 100 times, beginning when the youngster was still using a car seat. He was arrested at his house, right on October 2 (Pictures: Hot Springs PD/Google Maps)

A pedophile raped a little girl over 100 times, beginning when the youngster was in her car seat, it is claimed.

Tony Kiah Caver, 37, reportedly attacked his alleged victim scores of times until the assaults were discovered by the victim’s mother last month.

Caver, of Hot Springs in Arkansas, was busted after his victim, who is now 12, sent a text to a friend alluding to the rapes on September 30.

Asked about the message by her mother, the girl said she’d been raped by Caver.

She was then taken to a specialist child advocacy center for an interview, where she detailed being molested by Caver dating back to when was ‘in a car seat.’

Caver is said to have openly described himself as a pedophile to his young victim, and reportedly told her he ‘can’t help who he likes.’

He is also said to have told the girl that ‘he does like kids’, and shown her child sex abuse images and videos on his computer.

The Hot Springs Sentinel Record reported that police executed a search warrant of Caver’s home on October 2.

After explaining the allegations they were there to investigate, Caver reportedly mentioned his alleged victim’s name before police did, and asked if it was related to her.

He is then said to have told police they could scan his computer.

Caver is also said to have spoken to cops outside his house, telling them: ‘It doesn’t matter, they are going to find everything they need anyway.’

The suspected child sex attacker has been charged with rape, and is being held in jail without bond.

Caver was due to make his first appearance in court on Monday.

He faces a life sentence in jail if convicted of the allegations he is facing.
description: Tony Kiah Carver is said to have openly admitted being a pedophile to his victim, and reportedly told her he 'can't help who he likes'
